display_long_description:
Titan Zero unleashes brutal VR mech warfare where steel clashes pilots rise and only the strongest survive Enter the cockpit rain destruction and carve your legend across the battlefield. NOW FIGHT ON!

[media]

Titan Zero drops you straight into the cockpit of a war machine in a full-scale multiplayer mech battle experience built for VR. 

[media]

Become a true mech pilot as you clash against other players in intense 5v5 competitive matches, where teamwork is everything and every mech plays a vital role on the battlefield.

Choose from a diverse roster of mechs in small, Assault, and Sentinel classes, each equipped with unique weapon loadouts and tactical strengths. Take on specialized combat roles such as Flankers, Outriders, Artillery, Tanks, and Sentinels, with Sentinels dominating the field using devastating long-range firepower.

Customize your presence on the battlefield with unlockable skins and ability upgrades, letting you fine-tune your mech’s playstyle while showing off your dominance in combat.

[media]

Step into the arena. Master your role.
Pilot your mech to victory in Titan Zero.

We build Titan Zero with our community. We are now actively listening to player feedback and recommendations to help shape the future of the game. If you have ideas, suggestions, or feedback, feel free to reach out to us directly on Discord: https://discord.gg/bpFTkfXqCW
